notes:
Appeared during [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary|Tibia's 15th]] and [[Tibia's 20th Anniversary|20th Anniversary]] celebrations, in a raid at a random time once a day.
The following message will appear:
{{Server Message|The birds in the forest below the Outlaw Camp have stopped to sing. There's gonna be a riot here soon.}}
And 20 minutes later, when [[Lyxoph (Creature)]] spawns:
{{Server Message|Lyxoph and his mechanical minions have appeared in the forest below the Outlaw Camp.}}
sounds: Warning! A huge steam machine TIN LIZZARD is approaching fast.
name: Tin Lizzard of Lyxoph
strategy: These monsters are summoned by [[Lyxoph (Creature)]]. Avoid being hit by more than 2 because they can deal a lot of damage. After Lyxoph is dead, these creatures will sometimes stay alive as long as nobody kills them. This can be dangerous for low-leveled players.
